attributes.title: And Then There Were Nine - Episode 1
attributes.caption: And Then There Were Nine
attributes.description: Burnie tries to throw a nice party for the Rooster Teeth staff, but it quickly spirals into an evening of riddles, blackmail... and MURDER.
attributes.display_title: S1:E1 - And Then There Were Nine - Episode 1

attributes.title: And Then There Were Eight - Episode 2
attributes.caption: And Then There Were Eight
attributes.description: Trapped and scattered, the remaining employees encounter shocking revelations, emotional breakthroughs, and, well... more murder.
attributes.display_title: S1:E2 - And Then There Were Eight - Episode 2

attributes.title: And Then There Were Seven - Episode 3
attributes.caption: And Then There Were Seven
attributes.description: Some choose to hide, others choose to fight, and one won't have a choice but to die in the latest Ten Little Roosters.
attributes.display_title: S1:E3 - And Then There Were Seven - Episode 3

attributes.title: And Then There Were Six - Episode 4
attributes.caption: And Then There Were Six
attributes.description: As deep secrets are unearthed -- and the Roosters' sanity slips away -- yet another employee meets their untimely end.
attributes.display_title: S1:E4 - And Then There Were Six - Episode 4

attributes.title: And Then There Were Five - Episode 5
attributes.caption: And Then There Were Five
attributes.description: With only six survivors left, trust beings to unravel and some roosters find their circumstances have worsened considerably... and for at least one, that also means death.
attributes.display_title: S1:E5 - And Then There Were Five - Episode 5

attributes.title: And Then There Were Four - Episode 6
attributes.caption: And Then There Were Four
attributes.description: The remaining Roosters try different ways of contacting the police.. while one tries a new way to die.
attributes.display_title: S1:E6 - And Then There Were Four - Episode 6

attributes.title: And Then There Were Three - Episode 7
attributes.caption: And Then There Were Three
attributes.description: Whittled down to four, the remaining survivors must deal with a common threat in the penultimate episode of season one!
attributes.display_title: S1:E7 - And Then There Were Three - Episode 7

attributes.title: And Then There Were Two & One - Episode 8
attributes.caption: And Then There Were Two & One
attributes.description: Just three survivors left. One will die a victim. One will unveil their master plan. And one might just make it out of this alive in the Ten Little Roosters finale!
attributes.display_title: S1:E8 - And Then There Were Two & One - Episode 8
